FREE_SPIN_ENABLED.NAME: Free Spin Enabled
FREE_SPIN_ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Is the game enabled for Free Spin Rewards

FREE_SPIN_VALUE_REQUIRED.NAME: Free Spin Value Required
FREE_SPIN_VALUE_REQUIRED.DESCRIPTION: Does the game require a Free Spin Value for Free Spin Rewards

FREE_SPIN_PLAY_THROUGH_ENABLED.NAME: Free Spin Play Through Enabled
FREE_SPIN_PLAY_THROUGH_ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Does the game allow a Play Through associated to Free Spin Rewards

FREESPINS.FREE_SPIN_VALUE_ENABLED_EXPLAIN: Game requires a value in cents to be assigned to each free spin e.g. 25 would indicate each spin is worth 25 cents
FREESPINS.FREE_SPIN_VALUE_DISABLED_EXPLAIN: Game does not require a value in cents to be assigned to each free spin
FREESPINS.FREE_SPIN_PLAY_THROUGH_DISABLED_EXPLAIN: Game does not support play through abilities.
FREESPINS.FREE_SPIN_VALUE_MISSING: Please specify free spin value in cents.
